Summary: 3 lights, sparkling orange/gold that made a triangle shape. 1 light moved inside the triangle and back out again to the edge. consistent speed across the sky
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Cincinnati
There were no other sightings in Cincinnati on or around April 16th 2013
divs: sighting detailsi was looking for shooting stars when i noticed 3 lights in the shape of a triangle heading n nw toward me from s se and then over head to the west. object passed directly over hughes high school and university of cincinnati law college at 500ft-1500ft up. object at least 40 feet wide or 3 separate crafts. within first 5-7 seconds of sight at 30 degrees from horizon, 1 of the 3 lights moved inside the triangle shape 2 or 3 times and back out again. stayed a consistent shape after that as a triangle. kept straight-line flight path and a consistent speed as it crossed over head and then out of view. 3 lights observed the entire time of 30-40 seconds, sparkling orange\gold. i pulled out my flashlight and signaled sos strobe at 400 lumens and the object did not respond. at this time the object had already passed over head and i was flashing from behind the craft.
